subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: Nikolay Skvortsov of Russia, Amaury Leveaux of France and Sanja Jovanovic of Croatia set world records at the European short-course championships in Rijeka, Croatia. Skvortsov won the 200-meter butterfly in 1 minute 50.60 seconds, breaking the 2002 mark set by Franck Esposito of France by 0.13.
